title: House price index in Canada 2016
summary: The following line chart is about the House and price index in Canada during 2016 .
From the graph it 's clearly possible to see how the Index values have been steadily increasing during 2016 .
Few light fluctuations have been reported during the summer months .
gold: The graph shows the house price index increasing over the year . It stayed the same for the mon of May and September but was increasing continuously throughout the year otherwise .
